thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: Sticks and stones will break your bones but words will never hurt you.
thread.title_full: Sticks and stones will break your bones but words will never hurt you. | News24

author: news24.com
title: Sticks and stones will break your bones but words will never hurt you.
text:
To me this is like journalists giving a speech to an empty room. All you here is the sound of your own voice. \
I always found the comments section entertaining and a great barometer of the general feeling of the internet community on an issue.
Surely this feedback is invaluable to you when understanding what your market is interested in?
Yes there are some morons who publish a lot of rot but so what?
I think your site has lost a lot of its value and I will now revert back to moneyweb.
In the last few months I had exclusively been on news24 but sadly this will end as I will no longer be able to use other peoples views from your site to inform my own and my thinking.
